department: Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Provision of Temporary Help Services to Departments and Agencies, on as and when required.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title and Reference

* Title: **Temporary Help Services**
* Reference: **EW479-212627-F**
* Date: **2023-11-01**

## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in Southern Alberta.

## Key Details

* Tender Closing Date: **2023-11-17T14:00:00 EST**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-12-01**
* Expected Contract End Date: **2024-05-31**
* Possible Extension: **1 additional year period**

## Procurement Method

The tender will be awarded through a competitive process, following the Canada Trade Agreement (CTA).

## Service Description

The procurement includes a Voluntary Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business. The services will be provided in one or more of the geographical areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work, on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Submission Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by **2023-11-17T14:00:00 EST**.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Andrew Hemy (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17881698?extsite=MTc4ODE2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17881698?extsite=MTc4ODE2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
